overview: A theatre performance by Jarosław Iwaszkiewicz, directed by Olga Lipińska in 1972. The role of Chopin was played by Leszek Herdegen, and George Sand - Halina Mikołajska. An attempt to recreate the atmosphere of the home of Baroness Aurora Dudevant, a writer known all over the world under the name of George Sand.
title: Lato w Nohant
